title: Figure, "The Tenor Ivan Kozlovsky", ca. 1950
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Man wearing overcoat, seated, holds hat in right hand; square base. Inscription around thin edge of base (in Russian): "People's Artist U.S.S.R. / I. S. Kozlovsky."

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "The Tenor Ivan Kozlovsky", ca. 1950.
ca. 1950. Porcelain, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-248.
